about_the_game: This is a linear visual novel, LVG and GALGAME that takes you into the dramatic life of Huang Hu, the ambitious factory director. Huang Hu finds himself entangled in a web of complex emotions involving his alluring sister-in-law, a loyal housemaid, and his strong-willed wife, Makeni. This story-driven game offers an immersive experience with a focus on rich character development and a compelling narrative. You can experience what it's like to be the sole male protagonist, navigating the ambiguous relationships and mutual scheming among multiple female characters while seeking solace for your soul. As the tale unfolds, you'll witness love, betrayal, and ambition collide, leading to moments of tension and heartbreak. With its single, carefully crafted storyline, this game offers a deep and emotional journey for fans of visual novels, inviting players to uncover the truths and lies behind the relationships that define Huang Hu’s world. Step into the drama and experience a story of love and conflict like never before.

This game doesn't sell for more than 300, not 500, only this much, don't ask me why, because the factory manager is my cousin! Come money, money come!
